column5: Would love to hear some suggestions on where else i can look for a used motor. Thanks
i found my motor guide  on the site big fat bass. before i found this site
Call Brian Beurault and ask if he has any used refurbs in the back at Backwater...
Are you looking for a bow mount or transom? I could have a Minnkota Endura 46 transom mount for sale...
Try Rocky's in Orillia. He's usually got a few used units kicking around.  Edit: What is it your looking for exactly?  S.
I thought I saw a sweet deal on one on spoonpullers last week.
Jocelyn at Angling Outfitters has a couple used cable-steer models in stock.  Could you let us know what you're after?
I've got a 50lbs MinnKota powerdrive bow mount for sale in the next couple weeks.. PM if interested
Sorry it took so long to reply i am looking for a transom mounted motor and am not quite sure of the size i would need. I have a 12'f aluminum.
Get yourself a 50-55lb and never have to worry about moving around the lake.  Minn Kota Maxuum or Traaxis are really nice, the enduras are cheaper but much harder on batteries.
